documentation.text:
@title Counter
 @dev A simple counter contract that allows increment and decrement operations

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Counter: caller is not the owner"

arguments.value: Counter: caller is not the owner

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Counter: caller is not the owner"

documentation.text:
@dev Decrements the counter by 1
 @notice Counter cannot go below zero

@dev Resets the counter to zero
 @notice Only the owner can reset the counter
